headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The Dog Pound. Suicide with Arsenic. How Some People Live. To Meet Here. Chief Justice Lee of the Hawailan Islands in Town. The Other Side., Fire In Gold-Street. Military Visit?? Still another Suicide.? New-York Ecclesiological Society. A Russian Vessel that was captured in New-York.

docs.lead_paragraph: The first month of Summer opens, and no Dog Pound. Citizens, appreciative of the many additional guarantees to their security and comfort given under the present watchful Administration, begin to think it unnecessary to remind His Honor the Mayor of their wants. They would hardly intimate even a measure of immediate necessity,

docs.lead_paragraph: There seems to be-about New-York, what one might call ulcer-spots. There are blocks or lanes in the midst of otherwise respectable quarters, which are crowded with the poorest and most dissolute people. These work upon one another, until there comes to be a kind of traditionary character of villainy and beggary about the place.

headline.main: LATEST INTELLIGENCE; By Telegraph to the New York Daily Times. Our Foreign Relations.

docs.lead_paragraph: Our affairs with all foreign nations are progressing peacefully, according to late reliable advices, and in such a manner as to create the impression that whatever difficulties exist will be amicably ad. justed. Mr. MCLANE, Minister to China, is here on business with the Department. The state of his health

headline.main: EIGHT DAYS LATER FROM CALIFORNIA.; $413,791 ON FREIGHT. ARRIVAL OF THE STAR OF THE WEST. IMPORTANT FROM SAN FRANCISCO SUSPENSION OF PAGE, BACON & CO. Closing Scenes of the State Legislature Sailing of the Walker Expedition. CALIFORNIA MARRIAGES AND DEATHS. THE MARKETS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Star of the West, of the Nicaragua line, E. W. TURNER, Commander, arrived last evening from Punta Arenas, with 300 passengers and $415,000 in Specie of Freight to C. MORGAN. Esq. The steamship Star of the West arrived outward at Punt?? Arenas on the 22d ult.

headline.main: Manslaughter Among the "Land sharks" at Quarantine.

docs.lead_paragraph: The quietude of the citizens at Quarantine, outside of the walls of the institution, was much disturbed yesterday morning by the announcement of the fact that two of the " Land Sharks," or "Runners," who have infested Tompkinsville for years, had been fighting on the hill, and that a man by the name of McCARTY had killed a brother 'runner" by the name of CONNELLY. Inquiry

docs.lead_paragraph: We have had another "speck of war." The political excitement gradually has been cooling off, till it was understood that the schemes which the fire-eaters had cherished, of coming here and tearing down the American Hotel, had been abandoned.
docs.snippet: We have had another "speck of war." The political excitement gradually has been cooling off, till it was understood that the schemes which the fire-eaters had cherished, of coming here and tearing down the American Hotel, had been abandoned.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; Meietlng of the Board of Education. IonWt Water the Crossings. Work llrnished by thlo Elmgraiit Commis. slonors. Emigrants to the Old World. The School (No. 29) in the First Ward. Nlew-York Union theologicall Seminary. The Fire in Ann-street. Mayor's Office.

docs.lead_paragraph: A quorum of the members being present for special business, the minutes of the last meeting were read and approved. After the transaction of some preliminary matters, it was moved and seconded that the Board go into Committee of the Whole upon the Normal School Report, document No. 8, presented from the Executive Committee, submitting additional by-laws for the government of a daily Normal School.

headline.main: HAVANA.; Relief from Blockade-Volunteers Disbanded -American War Vessels in Port.

docs.lead_paragraph: We are relieved from the state of war, of siege and blockade, "under the circumstances," having established, by proof ample and satisfactory, the attitude of our people in loyalty and patriotism. All the clouds that lowered upon our isle are dis. persed, and in the deep bosom of the gulf buried, and our discontent soothed to the sunniest smile under the subtle guile of noble-hearted CONCHA.
